sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Button, View, Image, Text, FlatList, TextInput, TouchableOpacity} from 'react-native'
import { getCharacter, getNextCharacterPage, getCharacterId } from '../../component/api/rick-and-morty'

const CharDetailScreen = (props) => {
const id = props.route.params.id
const [character, setCharacter] = useState({name:'', origin:{}, location:{}})
useEffect(() => {
  buscar(id)
}, [])
async function buscar(id){
  const c = await getCharacterId(id)
  console.log(c.data)
  setCharacter(c.data)
}


  return (
    <View>
        <View style={styles.characterContainer}>
          <Image style={styles.characterImage} source={{ uri: character.image }} />
          <View >
            <Text>{character.name}</Text>
            <Text>{character.status}</Text>
          </View>
          <View> 
            <Text>{character.species}</Text>
            <Text>{character.type}</Text>
            <Text>{character.gender}</Text>
          </View>

          <TouchableOpacity
        onPress={() => {console.log('touchable opacity pressed')
        navigation.navigate('LocationDetailScreen')}}> 
            <View>
            <Text>{character.origin.name}</Text>
            </View> 
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity
        onPress={() => {console.log('touchable opacity pressed')
        navigation.navigate('LocationDetailScreen')}}> 
          <View>
            <Text>{character.location.name}</Text>
            </View> 
            </TouchableOpacity>

        </View>
      

  

<Button
      onPress={() => { navigation.navigate('EpisodeDetailScreen') }}
      title="EPISODES" />

    </View> )

}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    mainView: {
      justifyContent: 'center',
      padding: 10,
      backgroundColor: 'white'
    },
    characterContainer: {
      flexDirection: 'row',
      alignItems: 'center',
      marginVertical: 5
    },
    characterImage: {
      width: 90,
      height: 90,
      marginRight: 10
    },
    textInput: {
      borderWidth: 1,
      borderColor: '#CCCCCC',
      height: 35,
      padding: 5
    },
    marginVertical: {
      marginVertical: 5
    }
  })

export default CharDetailScreen
